Interrupts.Name: Corrective Fire
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 2 misses with an attack.
Interrupts.Effects: The ally's target must save. On a failed save, they take [D] from the Decurion and become burning. Burning foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Arm Shot
Actions.Mark: While marked, after they attack, they must save or take [fray] damage and become pacified. If a foe ends a turn without attacking, this mark ends.
